mapper.insert: insert ignore into bookmark (project_id, member_id) values (#{projectId}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where project_id=#{projectId} and member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select b.bookmark_id, p.project_id, p.title, p.created_at from bookmark b inner join project p on b.project_id = p.project_id where b.member_id = #{memberId} order by p.created_at DESC
select b.* from bookmark b inner join project p on b.project_id = p.project_id where b.project_id = #{projectId} and b.member_id=#{memberId}
